      • verifyDetails

        public void verifyDetails(java.lang.String fname,
                          java.lang.String lname,
                          java.lang.String email,
                          java.lang.String address,
                          java.lang.String cnumber,
                          int smodel,
                          int atype)
        verify all input textfields values and if all ok send update details request to the server.
        Parameters:
        userid - - userid value
        fname - - first name value
        lname - - last name value
        pass - - password value
        repass - - retype password value
        email - - email value
        cnumber - - credit card value
        toc - - type of customer (0- for private,1-for company)
        atype - - access type value (0-Unique station, 1- 1 or more stations)
        smodel - - sale model value
